title: Calderdale: A Cyberpunk Thriller
description: Forensics Analysts Carrie Tarmell receives a frantic call from a mysterious stranger moments before they’re brutally killed. Or so it seems. Carrie believes it’s a murder case, but with no body to be found, at least not the victims, the justice algorithms classify it as a missing persons case.Desperate to find answers, Carrie is seconded to the bustling Great Northern Belt. While investigating the “disappearance” she stumbles across a vast conspiracy that could put her in corporate crosshairs.Doubting herself and fighting colleagues and family, Carrie questions her choices and her own identity. What does it take to make a person? What does it take to make a murder?
author: Dylan Byford
